section01.businessDescription: We are a family business dedicated to artisanal coffee roasting and the export of microlots of high-altitude green coffee.

callToAction.subtitle: A commitment to quality
callToAction.title: Enjoy a variety of coffee!
callToAction.description: Café San Luis is a line of coffees from the beautiful region of San Luis, Comayagua, Honduras and that seeks to satisfy the most varied and demanding tastes.

artisanCoffeeRoasting.title: Artisan Coffee Roasting
artisanCoffeeRoasting.description: The roasting method is as important as the coffee itself; artisanal roasting exposes the characteristics of the coffee in a unique and unmatched way.

microlotCoffee.title: Microlots of coffee
microlotCoffee.description: Together with our network of producers throughout Honduras, we offer you a wide variety of coffee with the best characteristics of the region.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: We offer you a wide variety of packaging for your products.

knowAboutUs.title: Learn more about us
knowAboutUs.author: Brayan Herrera
knowAboutUs.message: I welcome you to this community of producers and on behalf of all of us I thank you for considering this project or any of our products and services.

inHonduras.title: It's in Honduras
inHonduras.description: Are you looking for a coffee with a specific profile?

businessBiography.paragraph1: We are a family business that began operations in the summer of 2015 in the remote area of the town of San Luis, Comayagua, Honduras. Café San Luis is a dream realized with hard work and represents the best that our land has to offer to the world. We have always had a clear commitment with each stage of the artisanal process of elaboration of our coffee, of which we are currently proud. Today we have a varied line of coffee for all tastes and demands, for people that distinguish and appreciate good coffee. If you are one of those people, Café San Luis is for you.
businessBiography.paragraph2: In 2010, we started the project as coffee producers in the area of San Luis in the department of Comayagua, Honduras; growing conventional high altitude coffee at 1,425 meters above sea level; handling the following varieties of coffee, in hybrid: coffee 90, lempira, and h27. Also coffee of the arabica line in smaller dimensions such as: catuahí, bourbon and caturra. Always seeking the best treatment and care to our coffee in each process.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We always do the right thing. We are fair to our customers and genuine in all our business dealings.

values.title: Commitment
values.description: We listen to our customers and are constantly learning and improving.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Since our beginnings we have been committed to always give the best, our customers know it and value it.

mission.title: Mission
mission.paragraph: We provide a product under quality standards and a personalized service; efficient and effective. Our main objective is the satisfaction of our customers, so that they prefer and recommend us, positioning us successfully in the market with our values of innovation and leadership.

vision.title: Vision
vision.paragraph: Achieving great success in the entire range of business; industry and commerce. Gaining recognition nationally and internationally, becoming a benchmark of quality and prestige. Seeking to satisfactorily conclude each of the goals set; through perseverance and organizational dedication; in order to become a leading brand in the market.
